name: Deathlock
languages: the languages it knew in life

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The deathlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The deathlock is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma. It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
* Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, mage hand
* 3rd level (2 slots): arms of Hadar, dispel magic, hold person, hunger of Hadar, invisibility, spider climb

abilities.name: Turn Resistance.
abilities.description: The deathlock has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
